## Connection.getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption() method

Fetch the minimum balance needed to exempt an account of `dataLength` size from rent

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption(dataLength: number, commitment?: Commitment): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dataLength | number | size of account data |
|  commitment | [Commitment](./web3.js.commitment.md) | optional commitment level, defaults to class commitment level |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;number&gt;
